thread.section_title: Bondara Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bondara | www.bondara.co.uk | 4 of 394
thread.title: How5er

author: How5er
title: How5er
text: Being somewhat of a man-hoe, l have purchased several items from Bondara to entertain my harem. The company are really quick and easy to deal with and their products, thus far, have been great. Each item has been gratefully received with screaming abandon - the infamous Doxy being top of the list. Whilst the girls and l are very happy, suspect my neighbours are not. I await a noise complaint.
